folder: Troy Ave. & Herkimer St., Brooklyn, NY
text:
Troy Avenue, south from Herkimer Street. The old house, on the left, fronts on the latter street.

View 2 si north across Herkimer Street, showing the rear of the old house and the stucco Seventh Adventist Church, at the northeast corner of the intersection.

P. L. Sperr

view 1: Neg. No. A-1015
view 2: Neg. No. A-1016

August 27, 1941
Views 1,2
